data.pricing_trends: Prices for flights and accommodation raise in December due to holiday season, but discounts are available in January and February.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 3-6 months in advance for best deals on accommodations and flights.
data.demand: High demand during December for Christmas; remains steady but lower through January to March.
data.competition: Popular for winter sports destinations include Sweden and Norway, but Finland remains a unique experience due to Santa tourism and winter activities.
